meanings.definition: To make or become green in color.
meanings.sent1: The tree greened in the spring.
meanings.sent2: The grass greened after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The paint greened the walls beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The landscape greened under the warm sun.

meanings.definition: To cover with green foliage or grass.
meanings.sent1: She greened the garden with fresh plants.
meanings.sent3: The blanket greened the picnic spot.
meanings.sent4: The vines greened the old stone wall.
meanings.sent5: The ivy greened the trellis in the backyard.

meanings.definition: To become environmentally friendly or sustainable.
meanings.sent1: The company greened its operations to reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: The city greened its transportation system with electric buses.
meanings.sent3: The school greened its cafeteria by using reusable containers.
meanings.sent4: The family greened their home by installing solar panels.
meanings.sent5: The community greened the park by planting more trees.
